ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank G. de Leon, I. Fabian and F. Leon for help in SSPM National Park, and J. Rebman and J. Gregory for help utilizing the San Diego Natural History Museumâ€™s Herbarium. Materials were collected under a permit from the Ministry of Environment and Natural Resources (SEMARNAT-03-039) to J. Delgadillo. We also thank V. Gottlieb, K. Huxman, A. Sakai, S. Vanderplank, and W. Yang for help in planning, designing and carrying out the experiment.
